GSD.description:
nbd: fix io hung while disconnecting device

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.247 by commit 62d227f67a8c25d5e16f40e5290607f9306d2188. For more details please see the references link.
